name: GOBLiiiNS5
description:
GOBLiiiNS5 - The Invasion of the Morglotons
Point'nClick adventure game in 2d. French and english version.
Solo game, 3 elves working cooperatively, user, warrior and magician.
16 great levels full of puzzles, characters and humor.
A new episode of the Gobliiins series.
A great adventure for all ages.

The game is in 4 parts.
Please launch the winsetup.exe file for each part:
- To choose the language. Default: French, or English.
- To change display parameters, full screen, windowed, definition.
